Name: EEG dataset for speech decoding
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Moreira et al. "An open-access EEG dataset for speech decoding: Exploring the role of articulation and coarticulation"
StudyDescription: This dataset combines two related studies: Study 1 (2019) focused on consonant-vowel (CV) and vowel-consonant (VC) phoneme pairs, while Study 2 (2021) expanded to include single phonemes and phoneme triplets (CVC). Both studies employed TMS to targeted areas of the motor cortex during a phoneme discrimination task.
